trans-unit.source: If True, then password and password_hash can be omitted to permit a passwordless login.

trans-unit.source: If True, then only packages which have been removed (but not purged) will be returned.

trans-unit.source: If True, this function will return the IDs of the refs/commits passed which cannot be reached by another commit.

trans-unit.source: If containers is not used, and the network is replaced, then Salt will keep track of the containers which were connected to the network and reconnect them to the network after it is replaced. Salt will first attempt to reconnect using the same IP the container had before the network was replaced. If that fails (for instance, if the network was replaced because the subnet was modified), then the container will be reconnected without an explicit IP address, and its IP will be assigned by Docker.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用 containers ，并且更换了网络，则Salt将跟踪已连接到网络的容器，并在更换后将它们重新连接到网络。Salt将首先尝试使用与更换网络之前容器相同的IP重新连接。如果失败（例如，如果由于修改了子网而更换了网络），则将在没有显式IP地址的情况下重新连接容器，并且Docker将分配其IP。

trans-unit.source: If a docker_container.running state replaces a container, it will not be reconnected to the network until the docker_network.present state is run again. Since containers often have require requisites to ensure that the network is present, this means that the docker_network.present state ends up being run before the docker_container.running, leaving the container unattached at the end of the Salt run.
trans-unit.target: 如果 docker_container.running 状态替换了容器，则直到再次运行 docker_network.present 状态，该容器才会重新连接到网络。由于容器通常 require 确保网络存在的必要条件，因此这意味着 docker_network.present 状态最终在 docker_container.running 之前运行，而在Salt运行结束时未附加容器。

trans-unit.target: 如果property_types参数指定了自定义属性,replace_default_attributes决定这些属性是否会被添加到默认属性中(False)或完全替换默认属性(True)。默认的设置是'False',如果属性_type参数指定了自定义属性,则replace_default_attributes决定这些属性是否会被添加到默认属性(False)或完全替换默认属性(True)。

trans-unit.target: 如果debconf不知道某个包,我们返回None。

trans-unit.target: 如果destructive为True,则删除整个纹理。如果destructive为False,则将谷物的值设置为None。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: If directories are to be created, passing this option specifies the permissions for those directories. If this is not set, directories will be assigned permissions by adding the execute bit to the mode of the files.

trans-unit.source: If enabled and the uninit_bg feature is enabled, the inode table will not be fully initialized by mke2fs. This speeds up filesystem initialization noticeably, but it requires the kernel to finish initializing the filesystem in the background when the filesystem is first mounted. If the option value is omitted, it defaults to 1 to enable lazy inode table zeroing.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了uninit_bg功能,mke2fs将不会完全初始化inode表。这明显加快了文件系统的初始化速度,但是当文件系统第一次挂载时,需要内核在后台完成文件系统的初始化。如果省略了这个选项的值,默认为1,以启用懒惰的inode表归零。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, returns the user name, otherwise returns False
trans-unit.target: 如果启用,返回用户名,否则返回False。

trans-unit.source: If encrypted is None or True, the password will be automatically encrypted to the previous format if it is not already done.

trans-unit.source: If encrypted is None or True, the password will be automatically encrypted to the previous format if it is not already done.

trans-unit.target: 如果加密为True,则可以指定这个KMS Key ID来用这个密钥加密卷。在创建卷时可选择指定;之后将被忽略。Requires 'volume_name'.e.g.:arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:012345678910:key/abcd1234-a123-456a-a12b-a123b4cd56ef

trans-unit.target: 如果不使用显式预播；尝试请求主服务器的密钥批准。默认值： True

trans-unit.source: If feature flags are not support this forced to the default of 'false'
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持功能标志,则强制改为默认的'false'。

trans-unit.target: 如果出于某种原因希望将此命令的输出传递到文件或其他命令，则将不使用 filename 参数，并确保包括 --no-color ,这样就不会出现终端ANSI转义序列。

trans-unit.target: 如果force为True,则无论现有的或提供的值类型如何,现有的晶粒都会被覆盖。默认值为False

trans-unit.target: 如果full为true,则搜索完整的命令行,否则只搜索命令的名称。

trans-unit.target: 如果grant_option被设置为True,则执行授予期权检查

trans-unit.target: 如果grant_option被设置为True,那么权限的接受者就可以将其授予他人。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, Non-SSD disks will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, SSDs will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索 host 位置的SSD 。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, VMotion will be disabled for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将禁用 host 位置的VMotion 。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, VMotion will be enabled for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将为 host 位置启用VMotion 。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, VSAN will be disabled for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将对 host 位置禁用VSAN 。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, VSAN will be enabled for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将为 host 位置启用VSAN 。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, VSAN-eligible disks will be added to the hosts's VSAN system for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则会将符合VSAN要求的磁盘添加到主机的VSAN系统中作为 host 位置。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, the NTP configuration will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索 host 位置的NTP配置。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将为 host 位置配置NTP服务器。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, the VMotion status will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索 host 位置的VMotion状态。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, the VSAN status will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索 host 位置的VSAN状态。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, the VSAN-eligible disks will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索适用于VSAN的磁盘作为 host 位置。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, the date/time information will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索 host 位置的日期/时间信息。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将更新 host 位置的日期/时间。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: If host_names is not provided, the service policy information will be retrieved for the host location instead. This is useful for when service instance connection information is used for a single ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索 host 位置的服务策略信息。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.target: 如果未提供host_names，则将检索 host 位置的服务运行状态。当服务实例连接信息用于单个ESXi主机时，这很有用。

trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供配置的目标,命令行将被解析为target=foo和tgt_type=bar。

trans-unit.source: If no datasets are specified, then the command displays properties for all datasets on the system.

trans-unit.source: If no device is given, operate on the cache set itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出设备,则对缓存集本身进行操作。

trans-unit.source: If no directory is specified, the package will be installed globally. If no package is specified, the dependencies (from package.json) of the package in the given directory will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定目录,将在全局范围内安装软件包。如果没有指定包,将安装给定目录下的包的依赖关系(来自package.json)。

trans-unit.source: If passed, this parameter will change the behavior of the function so that, instead of traversing each data store above in order and returning the first match, the data stores are first merged together and then searched. This allows for configurations to be more flexible.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, this will consolidate all sources definitions to the sources.list file, cleanup the now unused files, consolidate components (e.g. main) for the same URI, type, and architecture to a single line, and finally remove comments from the sources.list file. The consolidate will run every time the state is processed. The option only needs to be set on one repo managed by salt to take effect.

trans-unit.source: If the merge-last strategy is selected (the default), then content of dict or list variables is merged recursively with previous definitions of this variable (similarly to the recurse salt pillar_source_merging_strategy). This allows for extending previously defined data.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the force_list parameter is False, then the return dictionary will not have a result key added to it. trans-unit.target: 如果 force_list 参数的值为 False ，则返回字典将不会添加结果键。在这种情况下，我们不会将 result 设置为 None ，因为 None 是JSON中“ null”的Python表示形式。（出于同样的原因，我们同样不能使用 False 。）

trans-unit.source: If there is a need to get a value from current zabbix online (e.g. id of a hostgroup you want to put a discovered system into), put a dictionary with two keys "query_object" and "query_name" instead of the value. trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, all port mappings will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略了这个参数,则会返回所有端口映射。

trans-unit.source: If this coalescing option is enabled, events are filtered based on their unicity, only unique events are enqueued, doublons are discarded. An event is unique when the combination of its fields (wd, mask, cookie, name) is unique among events of a same batch. After a batch of events is processed any events are accepted again. This option is top-level (at the same level as the path) and therefore affects all paths that are being watched. This is due to this option being at the Notifier level in pyinotify.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了这个聚合选项,事件就会根据它们的唯一性进行过滤,只有唯一的事件才会被列入队列,而双倍的事件则会被丢弃。当一个事件的字段组合(wd、mask、cookie、name)在同一批事件中是唯一的时,该事件就是唯一的。在处理完一批事件后,任何事件都会被再次接受。这个选项是顶层的(与路径处于同一级别),因此会影响所有被监视的路径。这是因为这个选项在pyinotify中属于Notifier级别。

trans-unit.source: If this configuration option is not found, Salt will use the appropriate interface (either nsenter or lxc-attach) based on the Execution Driver value returned from docker info. docker-exec will not be used by default, as it is presently (as of version 1.6.2) only able to execute commands as the effective user of the container. Thus, if a USER directive was used to run as a non-privileged user, docker-exec would be unable to perform the action as root. Salt can still use docker-exec as an execution driver, but must be explicitly configured (as in the example above) to do so at this time.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到此配置选项，Salt将根据从 docker info 返回的 Execution Driver 值使用适当的接口（nsenter或lxc-attach）。默认情况下将不使用docker-exec，因为它目前（自1.6.2版开始）只能以容器的有效用户身份执行命令。因此，如果使用 USER 指令以非特权用户身份运行，则docker-exec将无法以超级用户身份执行操作。 Salt仍可以将docker-exec用作执行驱动程序，但此时必须进行显式配置（如上例所示）。

trans-unit.source: If this configuration option is not found, Salt will use the appropriate interface (either nsenter or lxc-attach) based on the Execution Driver value returned from docker info. docker-exec will not be used by default, as it is presently (as of version 1.6.2) only able to execute commands as the effective user of the container. Thus, if a USER directive was used to run as a non-privileged user, docker-exec would be unable to perform the action as root. Salt can still use docker-exec as an execution driver, but must be explicitly configured (as in the example above) to do so at this time.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到此配置选项，Salt将根据从 docker info 返回的 Execution Driver 值使用适当的接口（nsenter或lxc-attach）。默认情况下将不使用docker-exec，因为它目前（自1.6.2版开始）只能以容器的有效用户身份执行命令。因此，如果使用 USER 指令以非特权用户身份运行，则docker-exec将无法以超级用户身份执行操作。 Salt仍可以将docker-exec用作执行驱动程序，但此时必须进行显式配置（如上例所示）。

trans-unit.source: If this is True, running applications will be forced to close without warning. If this is False, running applications will not get the opportunity to prompt users about unsaved data.

trans-unit.source: If this is True, the computer will restart immediately after shutting down. If False the system flushes all caches to disk and safely powers down the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "True",计算机将在关机后立即重新启动。如果为 "False",系统会将所有缓存清除到磁盘上,并安全地关闭系统。

trans-unit.source: If this option is set to True the input will be checked if a package with this name exists. If not, this function will search for a package which provides this name. trans-unit.source: If this option is set to True zypper will take capabilities into account. In this case names which are just provided by a package will get installed. Default is False.

trans-unit.source: If timeout is not zero, InitiateSystemShutdown displays a dialog box on the specified computer. The dialog box displays the name of the user who called the function, the message specified by the lpMessage parameter, and prompts the user to log off. The dialog box beeps when it is created and remains on top of other windows (system modal). The dialog box can be moved but not closed. A timer counts down the remaining time before the shutdown occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果超时时间不为零,InitiateSystemShutdown会在指定的计算机上显示一个对话框,对话框显示调用该函数的用户名称、lpMessage参数指定的消息,并提示用户注销。对话框显示调用该函数的用户名称、lpMessage参数指定的消息,并提示用户注销。对话框创建时发出蜂鸣声,并保持在其他窗口的顶部(系统模式)。对话框可以移动,但不能关闭。计时器会在关闭前倒计时剩余时间。

trans-unit.source: If timeout is zero, the computer shuts down immediately without displaying the dialog box and cannot be stopped by system.shutdown_abort.
trans-unit.target: 如果超时为零，则计算机将立即关闭而不显示对话框，并且无法由 system.shutdown_abort 停止。

trans-unit.source: If unset, then Salt treats package database refreshes differently depending on whether or not a pkg state has been executed already during the current Salt run. Once a refresh has been performed in a pkg state, for the remainder of that Salt run no other refreshes will be performed for pkg states which do not explicitly set refresh to True. This prevents needless additional refreshes from slowing down the Salt run.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则Salt会根据当前Salt运行期间是否已经执行过 pkg 状态来不同地刷新软件包数据库。在以 pkg 状态执行刷新后，对于Salt运行的其余部分，将不会对未明确将 refresh 设置为 True 的 pkg 状态执行其他刷新。这样可以防止不必要的额外刷新来减慢Salt的运行速度。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of Salt, refresh defaulted to False. This was changed to default to True in the 2017.7.0 release to make the behavior more consistent with the other package modules, which all default to True.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的Salt中， refresh 默认为 False 。在2017.7.0版本中已将其更改为默认值 True ，以使行为与其他软件包模块更一致，而其他软件包模块均默认为 True 。

trans-unit.source: In releases prior to 2017.7.0, this option was not set in the container configuration, but rather this timeout was enforced only when shutting down an existing container to replace it. To remove the ambiguity, and to allow for the container to have a stop timeout set for it, the old stop_timeout argument has been renamed to shutdown_timeout, while stop_timeout now refer's to the container's configured stop timeout.
trans-unit.target: 在2017.7.0之前的版本中，未在容器配置中设置此选项，而是仅在关闭现有容器以替换它时才强制执行此超时。为了消除歧义，并允许为容器设置停止超时，已将旧的 stop_timeout 参数重命名为 shutdown_timeout ，而 stop_timeout 现在引用了容器配置的停止超时。

trans-unit.source: In version 2015.8.9, an ignore_epoch argument has been added to pkg.installed, pkg.removed, and pkg.purged states, which causes the epoch to be disregarded when the state checks to see if the desired version was installed.
trans-unit.target: 在2015年8月9日的版本，一个ignore_epoch参数已被添加到 pkg.installed ， pkg.removed ，和 pkg.purged 状态，这会导致当见到的状态检查是否安装了所需版本的历元被忽略。

trans-unit.source: In version 2015.8.9, an ignore_epoch argument has been added to pkg.installed, pkg.removed, and pkg.purged states, which causes the epoch to be disregarded when the state checks to see if the desired version was installed. If ignore_epoch was not set to True, and instead of 2:7.4.160-1.el7 a version of 7.4.160-1.el7 were used, this state would report success since the actual installed version includes the epoch, and the specified version would not match.
trans-unit.target: 在2015年8月9日的版本，一个ignore_epoch参数已被添加到 pkg.installed ， pkg.removed ，和 pkg.purged 状态，这会导致当见到的状态检查是否安装了所需版本的历元被忽略。如果ignore_epoch未设置为 True ，并且使用的版本是 7.4.160-1.el7 ，而不是 2:7.4.160-1.el7 ，则此状态将报告成功，因为实际安装的版本包括该时期，并且指定了版本不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Install a specific version of a package. This option is ignored if "sources" is used. The version number includes the release designation where applicable, to allow Salt to target a specific release of a given version. When in doubt, using the pkg.latest_version function for an uninstalled package will tell you the version available.

trans-unit.source: Install the package into the specified root (ignored if jail is specified)
trans-unit.target: 将软件包安装到指定的根目录中（如果指定了 jail ,则忽略）

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package
trans-unit.target: 安装通过的软件包

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package group(s). This is basically a wrapper around pkg.install, which performs package group resolution for the user. This function is currently considered experimental, and should be expected to undergo changes.
trans-unit.target: 安装传递的软件包组。这基本上是 pkg.install 的包装，它为用户执行软件包组解析。该功能目前被认为是实验性的，应该预期会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package(s) on the system using winrepo
trans-unit.target: 使用winrepo将通过的软件包安装到系统上。

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package(s) with brew install
trans-unit.target: 使用 brew install 安装传递的软件包

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package(s) with port install
trans-unit.target: 使用 port install 安装传递的软件包

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package(s), add refresh=True to clean the yum database before package is installed.
trans-unit.target: 安装通过的包,在安装包之前添加refresh=True来清理yum数据库。

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package(s), add refresh=True to force a 'zypper refresh' before package is installed.
trans-unit.target: 安装通过的包,在安装包之前添加refresh=True来强制 "zypper刷新"。

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package(s), add refresh=True to sync the portage tree before package is installed.
trans-unit.target: 安装通过的软件包,在安装软件包之前,添加 refresh=True 来同步 portage 树。

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package, add refresh=True to update the apk database.
trans-unit.target: 安装通过的包,添加refresh=True更新apk数据库。

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package, add refresh=True to update the dpkg database.
trans-unit.target: 安装通过的软件包,添加refresh=True来更新dpkg数据库。

trans-unit.source: Install the passed package, add refresh=True to update the opkg database.
trans-unit.target: 安装通过的软件包,添加refresh=True来更新opkg数据库。
